name: Typing fever
description:
Type to your heart's conent! 

Typing fever was created as a Computer Science final project, running off the game engine PyGame, it is my first genuine game that I've ever made. Typing fever was created to help you type faster and not leave you absolutely bored out of your mind while practicing your skills!

Features:

Over 130 thousand unique words.
4 difficulty settings
Leaderboards
Endless gameplay

Check the "HowToInstall.txt" file on how to install the game
